attributes.action: removal of censorship on the public internet sky maps
attributes.additional_details:
It has been over 28 years since the Infra red astronomical survey was conducted,
Jointly constructed by the U.S.A the U.K & the Netherlands,
On every public internet sky map programme that uses IRAS data the same images are censored.
We ask why are these images still censored from the public sky map programmes ??.
